title: Global Content Blocks

fields.label: Image Frame Block
fields.name: image_frame_block
fields.instructions: Content block with image frame and text

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.placeholder: We embrace innovation to deliver cutting-edge solutions...

sub_fields.label: Terms Text
sub_fields.name: terms_text
sub_fields.default_value: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and consent to receive email updates and newsletters

sub_fields.label: Use Global Social Links
sub_fields.name: use_global_social_links
sub_fields.instructions: If enabled, frontend should pull links from global social media settings.

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: Upload any number of images for an infinite carousel.

sub_fields.label: YouTube/Vimeo URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: Paste a YouTube or Vimeo URL.

sub_fields.label: Video File
sub_fields.name: file
sub_fields.instructions: Upload a video file (mp4, webm, ogg).

sub_fields.label: Form Code
sub_fields.name: form_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste HubSpot form embed code. Can be overridden per page.

sub_fields.label: Use Global Contact Details
sub_fields.name: use_global_contact_details
sub_fields.instructions: If disabled, provide custom contact details below.

sub_fields.label: Contact Details Override
sub_fields.name: contact_details_override
sub_fields.instructions: Shown if not using global details.

description: Complete global content blocks for the CDA website
